name: The Coolest
description:
Become The Coolest so you can hang out with the cool people. You will do this by completing a series of platforming challenges.

Left and right move, spacebar jumps. The goal is to get the gem 7 times. You can hang on the bars.

Available for Windows 64-bit. Made for Oktrollberfest Game Jam 2020. Not eligible to win, because I'm helping to host. It's just for the shared trolling experience and to get some experience with GameMaker Studio 2
